biotools.summary: Class library implemented in C++, allowing for easy graphing any kind of data into any format. It provides all basic tool sets for drawing simple objects, as well as color manipulation methods, a rich set of compound graphs, and documentation.

bioschemas.name: Whiteboard
bioschemas.summary: Class library implemented in C++, allowing for easy graphing any kind of data into any format. It provides all basic tool sets for drawing simple objects, as well as color manipulation methods, a rich set of compound graphs, and documentation.
